title: 122 - The Boss Is Exonerated
description: On today's show, the boys chat about Connor's first and last night with Mitt at The Pub, Tony chats about getting his new truck, and the guys dive into a loaded Pod FOD that includes Bruce Springsteen being unfairly arrested for being a true American Patriot, they decide which style of pizza is the best, chat about the potential for a True Detective season 4, eliminate their least favorite successful movie franchises, Bill opens a few new Pokemon card packs live on the show, and much more before Nick adds a few more Friday Bangerz to the list as the guys send you into the weekend. Don't forget to send in your submissions to the Pod FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, we'll see you Monday.
dc:creator: The Pod
